## Block.getDefaultProperties() method

Get properties used in display mode

**Signature:**

```typescript
getDefaultProperties(field: string): FieldProperties;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  field | string | The name of the field to retrieve display mode properties for. |

**Returns:**

[FieldProperties](./forms42core.fieldproperties.md)

The properties used in display mode for the specified field, or `null` if not found.
